ISSUE.TITLE: Multi repo trigger with drone
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: My build is stacking the build environment with clones from multiple repository. Other repos are fetched with shell script. I am using gogs as repo container. I would like to trigger the build, if any of these repositories got a change. Is there a way to implement this with drone (2.24) ? I tried the repo trigger documented here: https://docs.drone.io/pipeline/triggers/#by-repository but i was not able to trigger the build with it. Maby it works only for pull requests?
